verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Neriah|strong="H5374"\w*, when he had \w written|strong="H3789"\w* these \w words|strong="H1697"\w* in a \w book|strong="H5612"\w* at the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, in the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,
Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, unto thee, O \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w*;

Thou didst \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Woe|strong="H0188"\w* is me now! for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w added|strong="H3254"\w* \w grief|strong="H3015"\w* to my \w sorrow|strong="H4341"\w*; I \w fainted|strong="H3021"\w* in my \w sighing|strong="H0585"\w*, and I \w find|strong="H4672"\w* no \w rest|strong="H4496"\w*.

Â¶ Thus shalt thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* thus; Behold, \add that\add* which I have \w built|strong="H1129"\w* will I break \w down|strong="H2040"\w*, and that which I have \w planted|strong="H5193"\w* I will pluck \w up|strong="H5428"\w*, even this whole \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

And \w seekest|strong="H1245"\w* thou great \w things|strong="H1419"\w* for thyself? \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \add them\add* not: for, behold, I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* upon all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: but thy \w life|strong="H5315"\w* will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto thee for a \w prey|strong="H7998"\w* in all \w places|strong="H4725"\w* whither thou \w goest|strong="H3212"\w*.
